key.name: active-proxy
key.description: This proxy configuration is currently running.

key.name: default-editor
key.description: This allows to specify the text editor used for editing a proxy script.

key.name: in-development
key.summary: Set this boolean variable only for use in development
key.description: Only for the extension development: when enabling, this allows to have an entry 'Open the folder' in the extension menu, so as to have a rapid access to the extension folder. As normal users, do not use and do not set to true.
